de.esoco.ewt.layout

Class GridLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.ewt.layout.GenericLayout
      • de.esoco.ewt.layout.FluentCssLayout<GridLayout>
        • de.esoco.ewt.layout.GridLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.property.Fluent<GridLayout>

    public class GridLayout
extends FluentCssLayout<GridLayout>
    A CSS grid layout implementation. It provides fluent builder methods like rowGap(String) that can be invoked successively to set optional grid properties.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GridLayout()
      Creates a new instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void applyLayoutStyle(StyleData rStyleData, com.google.gwt.dom.client.Style rStyle)
      Must be implemented to apply the CSS properties for the layout parameters to the style of the layout container.
      protected void applyWidgetStyle(StyleData rStyleData, com.google.gwt.dom.client.Style rStyle)
      Must be implemented to apply the CSS layout properties for a widget when it is added by FluentCssLayout.addWidget(HasWidgets, Widget, StyleData, int).
      GridLayout areas(java.lang.String... aAreas)
      Sets the template areas property that define the grid layout ('grid-template-areas').
      GridLayout autoCols(java.lang.String sSize)
      Sets the size of automatically generated rows in implicit grids ('grid-auto-columns').
      GridLayout autoFlow(de.esoco.lib.property.Orientation eDirection, boolean bDense)
      Sets the automatic flow of grid items ('grid-auto-flow').
      GridLayout autoRows(java.lang.String sSize)
      Sets the size of automatically generated rows in implicit grids ('grid-auto-rows').
      GridLayout colGap(java.lang.String sGap)
      Sets the gap between columns.
      GridLayout columns(java.lang.String sTemplate)
      Sets the template for column sizing ('grid-template-columns').
      GridLayout gaps(java.lang.String sGap)
      Sets the gap between rows and columns.
      static GridLayout grid()
      A factory method to create a new uninitialized instance.
      static GridLayout grid(java.lang.String sColumns)
      A factory method to create a new instance with certain column definitions.
      static GridLayout grid(java.lang.String sRows, java.lang.String sColumns)
      A factory method to create a new instance with certain row and column definitions.
      GridLayout hAlign(de.esoco.lib.property.ContentAlignment eAlignment)
      Sets the horizontal alignment of the grid container in it's parent.
      GridLayout hAlignItems(de.esoco.lib.property.Alignment eAlignment)
      Sets the horizontal alignment of the items in the grid cells.
      GridLayout inline()
      Enables inline rendering (display = 'inline-grid').
      GridLayout rowGap(java.lang.String sGap)
      Sets the gap between rows.

      Sets the template for row sizing ('grid-template-rows').

      Sets the vertical alignment of the grid container in it's parent.
      GridLayout vAlignItems(de.esoco.lib.property.Alignment eAlignment)
      Sets the vertical alignment of the items in the grid cells.

      • areas

        public final GridLayout areas(java.lang.String... aAreas)
        Sets the template areas property that define the grid layout ('grid-template-areas'). The argument strings each define a row of the grid template.
        Parameters:
        aAreas - The template areas for the grid rows
        Returns:
        This instance for fluent invocation

      • autoCols

        public final GridLayout autoCols(java.lang.String sSize)
        Sets the size of automatically generated rows in implicit grids ('grid-auto-columns').
        Parameters:
        sSize - The auto-row size
        Returns:
        This instance for fluent invocation

      • autoFlow

        public final GridLayout autoFlow(de.esoco.lib.property.Orientation eDirection,
                                 boolean bDense)
        Sets the automatic flow of grid items ('grid-auto-flow').
        Parameters:
        eDirection - The flow direction
        bDense - TRUE to fill in cells earlier in the grid if smaller items come up later (caution, may change order of items and therefore affect accessibility)
        Returns:
        This instance for fluent invocation
